replies.body: It turns on when you ult but you can also toggle it on and off manually

Neat. like Night Hunter Rengar's hood? (so with an animation?)

I think this will calm a lot of the people that wanted a more "creepy" void champion

Yup, like Zoe's Yo-Yo/Jump Rope and Night Hunter Rengars hood, you can toggle them with a emote. If you don't toggle it manually it will come on when she ults or usese E and then come off when she exits combat, like Yassuo's Sword sheathing.

wait wait wait... I didn't know you could toggle Zoe's walking anims as well XD. I know for heimer you can do that too.. will have to test it :D (jump rope is trollier so it is a significant buff to be able to control it)

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RlrAEsuh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-20T18:25:33.443+0000)
>
> It turns on when you ult but you can also toggle it on and off manually

I like the new champion, but from the videos I can already tell she will such a cancer. You gave an adc the ability to be in and out of fights like only melee champions should be able to. The game play and mechanics are going to be such a problem....

Not entirely true. First, she needs to build a bunch of a stat to get the bonus effects on her abilities, so it's not like she can just jump into invisibility and tons of missiles immediately. She has no CC, and her only self peel is a two second speed boost that prevents her from attacking. She needs to build attack speed to get the invisibility on it. Unless she can snipe or an ally lands CC, she can't start a fight with her ultimate. She seems like she'll be fine, since her only survival tool revolves around losing the ability to attack and having to build a particular stat to get the stealth.

Yeah, as long as she doesn’t turn out to be a generic ADC I’ll be picking her up as my new assassin champion. Judging by her skills my build will either look like Guinsoo’s gunblade into statik shiv essence reaver IE or guinsoo’s gunblade in nashors+AP. 

She’s looking like a lot of fun.
See Kayle's build.  That's the way to go.
Not sure about that. Crit may still be good.

I'm sure it might be, but she can deal over 3k dps with on hit build, not including the runaan's bolts.  For on hit you might even run smite to get bloodrazor which gives AS and does 4% max health per auto, add that to rageblade and that's 12% every 2 autos.

Hmm. The thing is she does need to reach 100 bonus AD and 100 bonus AP. So she is going to need both Gunblade and runaan’s at the very least. 

I could see a gunblade guinsoo’s runaan’s statikk shiv ie build being busted on her. As expensive as that is. 

She basically has no choice but to build a minimum 2 AP and 2 AD items, be they hybrid or not. So we could have Nashor’s botrk runaan’s, or we could have gunblade guinsoo’s which seems just easier to build overall. 

Basically the issue with the generic on hit build is it needs modifications to work on her and trigger her requirements. 

So the other possible build could be gunblade guinsoo’s wits end runaan’s botrk. For jungle the botrk or wits end would be replaced with bloodrazor.

It makes sense to start Gunblade or Rageblade, but both are indispensible to her kit.  Runaan's is also a crucial item, as well as BORK.  You have 100+ AP with Rageblade and Gunblade, so the 4% max health from bloodrazor is better than a wit's end.  Nashor's tooth would be a good item, but I think the two % health items and her passive would work well into a tanky comp.  If the opposing team is all squishy, then build Nashor's tooth instead.  I wouldn't build wit's end, it's just a weak item, and Nashor's Tooth or Bloodrazor would suit her better.
I'd start Rageblade if the enemy has a tanky comp, and Gunblade if they have a squishy comp or if you're having lane trouble.
Yep.

Wits end reduces MR by a lot while also gaining 40 on hit magic damage and tankiness, hence why it’s such a good item. Rather than just adding an extra on hit, it increases all magic damage dealt to the target as well.

There’s a reason Kog’maw rushes wits end and why current day Varus even gets it. 

But I can see her building a bloodrazor if their team has two or more serious tanks.
Is the voidling suit conscious and interacts with her verbally or is it just making void noises?

I'll admit, wasn't too much a fan of her, from a visual design perspective, but the fact that she has full body armor has really sold me on it. 

Also the Samus vibes help a ton
I got more of an Xcom feel to her rather than a samus one.
How exactly is her name pronounced tho? I really can't put it together.

I assume,

K- eye- suh

Just about right.  Just make sure the first part is a single syllable  and you got it.  

Edit:  If you use phonetic notation:   kaɪ-sɑː   (the a at the end is like the 'a' in 'father')
HAHAHA that sounds like cheese in Spanish XD (queso)
Queso is pronounced Kay- so, not the same at all.
no, it is pronounced keh-suh (I'm mexican dude, I think I know how to speak my language XD)

You either apparently dont, or there are different dialects.
https://youtu.be/07t4yjigIOs

I said it sounded like queso, not identical. Also you wrote:

> Kay- so

Kay is a different sound altogether {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

And yes there are many spanish variations given it is the 3rd most spoken language in the world.

Also I'm a Native spanish speaker... as in I am using my second language right now. How come I "apparently don't speak it". People are way to aggresive and fisty on these boards :/

Listen to how they say queso.

The que, is pronounced exactly like Kay.  Kay is pronounced the same as the name of the letter K, the que in queso is pronounced the same as Kay, it is not "a different sound altogether".  Her name is not similar to Queso.
Queso
[K- ay]- [so]
Kai'Sa
[K-eye] - [Suh]

A K syllable followed by an S syllable does not make it sound similar.

hhaah no no. In spanish vowels only have one sound, expect "u" which is mute sometimes. "E" always sounds like it would in the word "except"

Anyhow this argument is ridiculous now so toodles
Literally inches above tgis on your monitor is a video proving you wrong.  So yes your argument _is_ ridiculous.
